item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

11/19/2012's location will be:Temple Grill

 

Temple Grill is a quaint little bar near the Omni Hotel, it was voted
Best Restaurant in New Haven County 2011 in CT Magazine. They have a great menu with a unique salad card to create your own salad.

The owners are very enthusiastic to have us come for a happy hour, and will be giving us happy hour drink specials....I will update with that info as soon as I get it.....

Specials for Meet – UP
$5.00 each

Drinks

California Chardonnay or Cabernet

Red Sangria

Draft - Sierra Seasonal or Harpoon IPA

Martini’s – Pear Dare or Temple Plummer

Snacks

Chicken Two Way
Buffalo Shrimp
Chicken Satay

Gail will host and can be reached at 203-824-9869.

Please RSVP for this event when able to give Chris a heads up.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

For more information about the Bar, please visit: http://www.templegrill.com/

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour 11/19 - Temple Grill
